definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to go down/to descend/to go on/to continue/(of a servant) to withdraw

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 无论你想去哪儿，都会有些友好的人。

sentences.english: 'Madame has gone to Paris, ' Nanine answered.
sentences.chinese: “太太到巴黎去了，”纳尼娜回答我说。

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱们一起去看电影吧，到时候我来叫你。

sentences.english: B. Replan the project without the resources.
sentences.chinese: 跑去资源重新计划该项目。

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他总是为他的生活而兴奋，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当你是一个孩子的时候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: No thanks, I would rather go somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 那就算了，我再去别的地方看看吧。

sentences.english: The sugar-cane is taken to the factory where the juice is crushed out.
sentences.chinese: 甘蔗被运到工厂中去榨汁。

sentences.english: But it donot make it any better, what Idid.
sentences.chinese: 但是我做的也好不到哪儿去。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是对图层进行去饱和，图层将获得辉光效果。

sentences.english: I think we should let Sylvia go camping with her boy-friend.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们应该让Sylvia和她男友一起去宿营。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在吃鱼的时候，才可以用手去捏鱼骨头。

sentences.english: We can ask for directions at the information desk.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以到问讯处去问路。

definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
